Actions.Name: Howl
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 take 2 damage, are weakened, and must save or be stunned.

Actions.Name: Bulk Up
Actions.Description: The [name] gains 4 vigor, or 6 vigor if bloodied.

Actions.Name: Iron Driver
Actions.Description: The [name] grabs an adjacent character, removing them from the battlefield, then rushes 2 spaces in any direction, placing them in a free adjacent space and slamming them into the ground repeatedly. That foe is slashed and must save or take 3 damage, three times or just 1 damage, three times on a successful save.
